Text: Hey Bud.  I've never seeded before and I would like to contribure to this awesome series.  how Do I seed on a Mac? Anyone?

this is how i do it

open bit torrent

click - file/create new torrent

clik add file

find the file you want to upload n add it

add the following tracker 

http://vip.tracker.thepiratebay.org/announce

in the tracker box........add others if you know others just make sure you have a clear line between each tracker

clik the start seeding box

then clik create n save as

save the torrent where ever you want 

clik close  n ur done


come here to piratebay at the bottom of the page you'll find -- upload torrent -- clik on it

just add the torrent you created on that page plus any other info you want to add

click upload n your done

TurtleKing, Macs are horrible for downloading anything besides photos and music from iTunes.
I wouldnt recommend downloading anything until you are on a win platform, such as windows.
